Text:
THANKS!!

Hearing intelligent talk is very important these days.  Sometimes I think Rush is the only thing keeping me sane!!!

@Arsventure - agree with you - seems everyone else is just 'out there' to one degree or another.

"Truth has its own attraction."

Levin, Schiff and Rush are my must listen to guys.

Each has an individual specialty where they seperately excel. Levin - law, Schiff in economics and Rush in politics, and they all have good foundations in the other two disciplines.

Combined they are the non religion Trinity of all things public policy.
